issues.description: Lack of alternative text for images.
issues.suggestion: Add 'alt' attributes to all images to provide descriptive text for screen readers.
Ensure that the text color has sufficient contrast against the background color to meet WCAG standards.
issues.code_suggestion: Change color to a darker shade or use a different background color.

issues.suggestion: Use ARIA landmarks or HTML5 semantic elements (like <nav>, <main>, <footer>) to improve navigation for assistive technologies.
